ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had monks, enchanters, bards, shadowknights, and paladins as pullers in LDoN groups. Paladins and Encs can pacify. The bard that pulled in my group was
ygData.messageBody:
I've had monks, enchanters, bards, shadowknights, and paladins as pullers in
LDoN groups. Paladins and Encs can pacify. The bard that pulled in my group
was very good. Shadowknight could FD but not as well as a monk. I think it
all depends on what the other classes are in the group and how well they
work together.
luv,
-Su

>Just out of curiousity, who do you use for pulling on like the Rathe
Council or LDoN? Still the monks?
>Awulfie A'Mused
